channel.title: RSCTools Map Editor
channel.description:
I've had this sitting on my laptop for a while now, about 10 months actually, and I just pulled it off the old drive in preparation for it's demise.
I haven't worked on it in forever, and haven't ever really been part of the RSC coding community, but besides this I was working on some tools to customize an RSC server. I realize that most people aren't interested but I figured I'd post it here anyways.
It's based off of [url=https://code.google.com/p/rscamap3deditor/]Peeter's 3D editor[/url], but [i]he listed[/i] his as kinda buggy, and the movement controls were just totally whack, so here's a few things I changed:
[ul][li]One-click launch .JAR file, no ANT scripts![/li] [li]Bug fixes[/li] [li]FPS-like camera movement[/li] [li]Movement by section, including up and down[/li] [li]Toggle roofs[/li] [li]Ability to edit sections 0x,0y to 255x,255y[/li] [li]Tile world position[/li] [li]Better section loading[/li] [li]Saves as .RSCD format[/li][/ul]
I wanted to add things like an object placement mode, and totally overhaul the actual landscape editing but I never got around to it.
All in all not really a major improvement of any sort, just fixed some irksome stuff.
Some pictures (Imgur): [spoiler= Move Panel] [url=http://i.imgur.com/8eeS5wb.png]http://i.imgur.com/8eeS5wb.png[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8eeS5wb.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler= Roof toggle] [url=http://i.imgur.com/YQnzPsU.png]http://i.imgur.com/YQnzPsU.png[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YQnzPsU.png[/img] [/spoiler]
Here's the dl links: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/zto816h2sr1vswt/MapEditor_2015-03-22.zip?dl=0]DropBox Mirror[/url] [url=https://app.box.com/s/7tq4xhxmep040tjep0ag2j48sa9eavnj]Box Mirror[/url]
Source can be found here: [url=http://rsctools.tk/mapeditor/]http://rsctools.tk/mapeditor/[/url]

item.description:
@tickle_me_elmo wrote:

[quote=“DeadHeadedZed, post:4, topic:550695”]I’m just using the .tk as a free domain, thought it made the site look sharper. I didn’t want to pay for a domain just to host this stuff.
It is my own site, no cookies, no ads.

Added some pictures.[/quote]

why not just use something like github pages?

item.title: RSCTools Map Editor
item.dc:creator: @DeadHeadedZed DeadHeadedZed
item.description:
@DeadHeadedZed wrote:

I’ve had this sitting on my laptop for a while now, about 10 months actually, and I just pulled it off the old drive in preparation for it’s demise.

I haven’t worked on it in forever, and haven’t ever really been part of the RSC coding community, but besides this I was working on some tools to customize an RSC server. I realize that most people aren’t interested but I figured I’d post it here anyways.

It’s based off of Peeter’s 3D editor, but he listed his as kinda buggy, and the movement controls were just totally whack, so here’s a few things I changed:

[ul][li]One-click launch .JAR file, no ANT scripts![/li]
[li]Bug fixes[/li]
[li]FPS-like camera movement[/li]
[li]Movement by section, including up and down[/li]
[li]Toggle roofs[/li]
[li]Ability to edit sections 0x,0y to 255x,255y[/li]
[li]Tile world position[/li]
[li]Better section loading[/li]
[li]Saves as .RSCD format[/li][/ul]

I wanted to add things like an object placement mode, and totally overhaul the actual landscape editing but I never got around to it.

All in all not really a major improvement of any sort, just fixed some irksome stuff.

Some pictures (Imgur):
[spoiler= Move Panel]
http://i.imgur.com/8eeS5wb.png

[/spoiler]

[spoiler= Roof toggle]
http://i.imgur.com/YQnzPsU.png

[/spoiler]
